title: Work postcode
h1: What’s the postcode where you worked or work?
p1: This will decide which Employment Tribunal office deals with your claim. If you worked at home, enter your home postcode.
p2: If you’re claiming against someone you did not work for, enter the postcode of where they are based.

workPostcode.required: Enter a postcode. For example, SW1 1AA
workPostcode.invalid: Enter a valid postcode. For example, SW1 1AA
